Message:
Power comes from the heart,
and our hearts are full of wishes.
If you wish for something
strongly enough, your power
will surge forth in answer...

That was what the fairy told me,
but...I lack faith in myself.

After all...I can never do
anything right...

“Everyone wants you to do this.
Now, before it is too late...!”

As though beckoned to do so,
I stretched out my hand
towards the fairy.

In that instant,
something entered my body,
and I felt power well up within me.

The sound of
gently flowing water...
and the harmony of
a warmly drifting breeze
rushed into my mind...
Please, I beg you!
Come back to us...!

Strumming my harp
as though in prayer,
water began to emerge
in answer to my song.

But, the next moment,
my body suddenly grew heavy.

No longer able to stand,
water continued to pour
into the lake, as though
rising to meet me...

Before I knew it, the lake...
had flooded out far past its shores.
